# isSiteSpecificQuirksModeEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether to apply site-specific compatibility workarounds.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSiteSpecificQuirksModeEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value for this preference is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Setting Java and JavaScript Preferences

- **javaScriptCanOpenWindowsAutomatically**: A Boolean value that indicates whether JavaScript can open windows without user interaction.
